name: Churchill
additionalNotes: The Nudes Bundle Cigar is the White Burgundy of cigars. White Burgundy gets its rich complex taste from the soil and aging of the grape in French oak barrels. The Nudes Bundleis a 4 to 5 year old Dominican filler blend has a rich, complex and well rounded taste. The extraordinary Connecticut shade wrapper is aged for an extra year and has an elegant palamino color resulting in a smooth and creamy flavor. The Nudes Bundle Cigar includes no less than six different tobaccos and ends with a big finish. Seven years pass from seedling to finished cigar before Nudes Bundle is brought to fruition and presented for your smoking pleasure.
